page.title: 19ST.BOTOLPH CHURCH HORSEHOUSE
page.content: Only one Church in survey area,our Vicar lives 7miles away in Middleham he is also responsible for churchs in Middleham & Carlton. During October 2 services of Parish Communion.Harvest Thanksgiving sale & supper 20th.Sept.raised almost Â£150 a proportion was sent to St.Botolph,s Crypt in the East end of London which receives support from this community. A lady parishioner from Swineside completed a Banner which nows hangs in Church & is organising the Hassock Project.24 hassocks are being made 12 by people living in the survey area, depciting life & features of the Dale. During the past 12mths. there has been{one}funeral,{no}marriages or baptisms. The door is always open & many sign the visiters book from Canada,Germany, many parts of England the 1985 visiter
